plot: Guests of Hotel Erotica Cabo experience erotic illuminations as they discover the liberated spirit which resides at a gorgeous resort on the beach in Cabo San Lucas. Shot on 35mm film at the Hotel Cabo San Lucas which was named a top 50 world destination by Conde Naste Magazine in 2002, Hotel Erotica Cabo is a mysterious place where conflicts and afflictions dissolve away with the waves and sex ...
